member.name: T:ERACompiler.Modules.Compiler
member.summary: The main abstraction class of the compiler.

member.name: M:ERACompiler.Modules.Compiler.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor for the compiler. Initializates all the modules such as Lexical Analyzer, etc.

member.name: M:ERACompiler.Modules.Compiler.Compile(System.String,ERACompiler.Modules.Compiler.CompilationMode)
member.returns: A string with the compiled source code. It is ready to be written to the file.

member.name: M:ERACompiler.Modules.Compiler.Compile(System.String)
member.summary: General compilation function. Returns generated assembly code.
member.param: A source code from a file.

member.name: T:ERACompiler.Modules.Compiler.CompilationMode
member.summary: Represents a level of compilation. For example syntax means lexical analysis plus syntax analysis.

member.name: T:ERACompiler.Modules.LexicalAnalyzer
member.summary: Contains functionality for conversion of source code of the program to the list of tokens.

member.name: M:ERACompiler.Modules.LexicalAnalyzer.GetTokenList(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a program source code to the list of tokens.
member.param: A source code of a program loaded from the file.
member.returns: A list of tokens constructed from the source code.

member.name: M:ERACompiler.Modules.LexicalAnalyzer.Analyze(System.Collections.Generic.List{ERACompiler.Structures.Token})
member.summary: Used for correction and analysis of the token list.
member.param: List with tokens to be analyzed.

member.name: M:ERACompiler.Modules.LexicalAnalyzer.IsAbleToDetermineToken(System.Char)
member.returns: Whether or not is it possible to understand what token has to be added to the list.

member.name: M:ERACompiler.Modules.LexicalAnalyzer.DetermineToken(System.Char)
member.summary: Constructs token judjing by the 'remembered' variable.
member.returns: Retruns the next token for the list.

member.name: M:ERACompiler.Modules.LexicalAnalyzer.DoesMatch(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Checks if any of the elements from the given list starts with the given sequence of charachters.
member.returns: Whether or not there is a match.

member.name: T:ERACompiler.Program
member.summary: The entrance point of the compiler.

member.name: T:ERACompiler.Structures.Token
member.summary: Represents a token which is used by Syntax Analyzer.

member.name: T:ERACompiler.Structures.TokenType
member.summary: Represents a type of a token. Used by Syntax Analyzer.
member.remarks: DO NOT CHANGE ORDER, ADD TO THE BOTTOM IF NEEDED!!!

member.name: T:ERACompiler.Structures.TokenPosition
member.summary: Position (in terms of line and characters on the line) of the token in the source code.
